history.content: This page is no longer being used for advising. Please email cs-advising

Hello, 

I am interested in taking this class as part of my last semester at Berkeley, I would like to know if I can take this class as an approved technical elective (for LSCS) since I have the option to choose between this class and CS169 for my schedule.

I would appreciate an instructor's response on this matter.

Thank you.

Edit: I'd also like to point out that since this course is being offered for the first time, it is not on http://guide.berkeley.edu/undergraduate/degree-programs/computer-science/#majorrequirementstext or https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/cs/degree-reqs-upperdiv, and I am posting here specifically because I do not know whether this lack appearance is because the course is not approved, is pending review, or will be a technical elective and the websites are simply out of date.
history.subject: Will CS 294-144 (Blockchain) count as a technical elective in Sp18?

history.content:
